While my instance is running, Iâ€™m going to pay for it. And if I stop it, Iâ€™m not going to pay for it And I can terminate my instance at any time I want. I can also request one instance or 100 instances when I want. And so this is really a huge shift in the mindset from traditional IT on-premises. When youâ€™re on-premises, you have to order your servers, get it delivered, you plug it into your infrastructure, and you use them for the next three to five years.
